answers.answer: I am 37 weeks and they are monitoring me for preeclampsia the symptoms they told me to look out for was pain on right side, high blood pressure, swelling, nausea, headaches , blurred vision and spotting. I hope you are better but if you are not call your doc. Hope this helps. Best wishes.

question: I'm 36 weeks and for the last 3days my right side has been sore and I don't have a appetite
title: my right side is sore what does that meam :(
